page.title: 11SCHOOL MEALS-CHEVYSIDE MDLE.
page.content: The cook at our school is called Mrs.McCallum. She helps to prepare the dinners at our school. We get{a choice {each day of different meals.}You can have a main course and a sweet.There are usually hot dogs or hamburgers and pizzas and things.I just like chips but I have to take something else or I get wrong from the dinner lady.The teacher makes sure you eat your meals quietly or else you get sent out.{The {teachers}are not in school at dinner times at the moment because they are in a{dispute over pay}so we can't stay in school at dinner times. We get {packed lunches}and have to take them away to eat them.I do not like the sandwiches and do not care for the milk shakes either.Lots of us do not eat them and buy something at the shops instead.{ E.Bell,aged 13
